ComicInfo.Title: Glory; Home for the Holidays?; Knightmare; Riptide
ComicInfo.Summary:
Glory: The Ancient gives Glory some advice.
Home for the Holidays?: The members of Bloodpool get a hokey Christmas lesson
Knightmare: Knightmare remembers a past Christmas he ruined for his boy.
Riptide: Riptide saves some scientists in Antarctica, along with some Yeti-like creatures.
